REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0005 reute r f BC-LOTUS-<LOTS>-GETS-ORD 03-09 0049

TEXT.TITLE: LOTUS <LOTS> GETS ORDER FROM MICRO D <MCRD>
TEXT.BODY: Lotus Development Corp said it has received a 30 mln dlr order from Micro D Inc for a number of Lotus software products. It said the order is the largest it has ever received and is to be delivered over six months. Reuter
